thread.title: Kelli
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Kelli

author: Kelli
title: Kelli
text:
Honestly, one of the most comfortable shopping experiences I've ever had. I was able to visit the show room several times without being pressured and the sales representative I worked with, Shawn, was great. He worked to find the best financing package for me, laid out all the options for the furniture I chose, and made sure I had a great experience.
The pricing was great and I'm really pleased with the quality of the couches I bought - so comfortable! Delivery drivers arrived when they said they would (live tracking so you can see how they're progressing), were super nice, and very efficient.
It's nice to find a place that offers quality product with the quality service to support it - 10/10, will shop again!
